course.title: Biology of the Inner Ear
course.meeting_text: Tu., Th., 9–10:30, F. laboratory hours to be arranged.
course.faculty_text: M. Charles Liberman (Medical School) and Stephane Maison (Medical School)
course.description: Normal biology, biophysics, physiology and morphology of the inner ear, its sensory innervation and efferent control systems, and the mechanisms underlying sensorineural hearing loss and balance disorders. Material is presented through lectures, laboratory exercises and discussions of the primary literature.
